components.LegalBanner.description: We use cookies in order to optimize the site and improve it continuously and to give you the best experience if you use to continue this site or click the accept button.
components.Preloader.caption: Please wait
components.Preloader.description: We are loading something for you
modules.unlock-wallet.components.NoBrows: Please install a browser wallet like: {metaMask}, {dapper}, {trustWallet}. You can still connect to Aave through other wallet options available to you.
modules.unlock-wallet.screens.UnlockWall: It's time to connect your wallet and to use our amazing DeFi platform. Deposit & Earn, Borrow, Govern or just enjoy our beautiful interface.
Create a new Fortmatic wallet or access using your phone number.
Use your phone to connect with Aave easily and securely.
{disclaimer} Wallets are provided by External Providers and by selecting you agree to Terms of those Providers. Your access to the wallet might be reliant on the External Provider being operational.
By unlocking Your wallet You agree to our {terms}, {privacy} and {cookie}.
Use your browser wallet to connect to Aave.
web3-data-provider.errorDescription: Please change your network to one of: {networks}
web3-data-provider.errorTitle: You are connected to the wrong network
